message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a valuable asset that holds significant worth to me, but I believe it would be even more beneficial in your hands. Given its importance to both of us, I propose a fair transaction of $15,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential it holds for you. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring if this is a match for your needs and interests.
